name: Consumer expenditure on food - USDA (2017)
title: Consumer expenditure on food - USDA (2017)
description:
Data on the share of consumer expenditure spent on food, and on alcoholic beverages and tobacco are given as the percentage of total consumer expenditures per person.

Data on overall annual consumer expenditure, and that spend on food is given in US$ per year.

sources.name: Consumer expenditure on food - USDA (2017)
sources.dataPublishedBy: United States Department of Agriculture (USDA) Economic Research Service
sources.additionalInfo:
Data on the share of consumer expenditure spent on food, and on alcoholic beverages and tobacco are given as the percentage of total consumer expenditures per person.

Data on overall annual consumer expenditure, and that spend on food is given in US$ per year.

fields.name: Share of consumer expenditure on food (USDA (2017))
fields.description: Percentage of consumer expenditure on food.

fields.name: Share of consumer expenditure on alcoholic beverages and tobacco (USDA (2017))
fields.description: Percentage of consumer expenditure on alcoholic beverages and tobacco.
